properties.name: rays3d.renderdb.rest.url
properties.description: The configured :render-db REST URL -- e.g., http://localhost:8080/renderdb

properties.name: rays3d.renderdb.rest.host
properties.description: The configured :render-db REST hostname -- e.g., localhost

properties.name: rays3d.renderdb.poll.duration
properties.description: Polling-interval used when checking for new render-descriptors in the render-db. E.g., '100' (100 milliseconds), '60s' (60 seconds), '5m' (5 minutes).

properties.name: rays3d.rendermq.use-embedded-broker
properties.description: If you are using the embedded ActiveMQ broker (e.g., for DEV), set this to TRUE. You should also set the corresponding property spring.activemq.broker-url to point to the embedded broker.

properties.name: rays3d.rendermq.embedded-broker-connectors
properties.description: A comma-separated list of connector-URLs to bind the embedded ActiveMQ broker to.

properties.name: rays3d.rendermq.embedded-username
properties.description: If you are using the embedded ActiveMQ broker, this configures that broker's username.

properties.name: rays3d.rendermq.embedded-password
properties.description: If you are using the embedded ActiveMQ broker, this configures that broker's password.
